resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/107390</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>107390</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770207276</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Just for Kids! at Yellowstone National Park</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Gerade für Zicklein! an Yellowstone 
Nationalpark</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Juste pour des gosses ! au parc national de 
Yellowstone</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Apenas para miúdos! no parque nacional de 
Yellowstone</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Appena per i capretti! al parco nazionale di
Yellowstone</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ακριβώς για τα κατσίκια! στο εθνικό πάρκο 
Yellowstone</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">¡Apenas para los cabritos! en el parque 
nacional de Yellowstone</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">offers a scavenger hunt of the Yellowstone National Park's website, online and printer-friendly coloring books, and an area where children can test their knowledge about our first national park.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Social Sciences</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">bietet eine Reinigerjagd der Yellowstone 
Nationalpark Web site, online und der Drucker-freundlichen 
Farbtonbücher und des Bereiches an, wo Kinder ihr Wissen über 
unseren ersten Nationalpark prüfen können.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">offre une chasse à Scavenger du site Web de parc 
national de Yellowstone, en ligne et des livres imprimante-amicaux de 
coloration, et une zone où les enfants peuvent tester leur 
connaissance au sujet de notre premier parc national.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">oferece uma caça do SCAVENGER do Web site de 
parque nacional de Yellowstone, em linha e livros 
impressora-amigáveis da coloração, e uma área onde as crianças 
podem testar seu conhecimento sobre nosso primeiro parque nacional.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">offre un pulitore cercano del Web site del
parco nazionale di Yellowstone, in linea e libri stampante-amichevoli 
di coloring e una zona dove i bambini possono verificare la loro 
conoscenza circa il nostro primo parco nazionale.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">προσφέρει ένα κυνήγι οδοκαθαριστών του ιστοχώρου του 
εθνικού πάρκου Yellowstone, on-line και των 
εκτυπωτής-φιλικών χρωματίζοντας βιβλίων, και μιας περιοχής όπου 
τα παιδιά μπορούν να εξετάσουν τη γνώση τους για το πρώτο εθνικό
πάρκο μας.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">ofrece una caza del limpiador del Web site del 
parque nacional de Yellowstone, en línea y libros impresora-co'modos 
del colorante, y un área donde los niños pueden probar su 
conocimiento sobre nuestro primer parque nacional.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sozialwissenschaften</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les Sciences Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciências Sociais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienze Sociali</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κοινωνικές επιστήμες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencias Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770207276</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Custom License</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>107390</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/just-for-kids-at-yellowstone-national-park</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
